name: PlagueTestsForYersiniaPestisAntibodyQualitative
title: Plague (Tests for Yersinia pestis Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yersinia pestis antibody (Qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Yersinia pestis antibody (quantitative);  

LOINC Search terms: ‘yersinia pestis Ab -Ql -panel -isolate’),(Exclusion Criteria: isolate tests)
